formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'PauseMonitor' =-
[Synopsis] Pause monitoring of a channel
[Description] PauseMonitor Pauses monitoring of a channel until it is re-enabled by a call to UnpauseMonitor.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,5 @@ Pause monitoring of a channel
[Description] - PauseMonitor + PauseMonitor(): Pauses monitoring of a channel until it is re-enabled by a call to UnpauseMonitor.
